message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'd like to meet you in the middle. How about we say $180?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $160?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $170?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $165?
I'm not willing to go much lower than that, but I'll try one more time. How about we meet at $170 isn't working, so I'll try $168?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one more offer. Would you be willing to go down to $165?
